posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jimi
Below is a list of T222s that I need.  I prefer SGC graded cards, but any are welcome.  I'm also welcoming upgrades to what I already have if you have something.  I am interested in buying or trading for the cards.  Thanks!

2 Archer, 5 Baumgardner, 6 Benton, 7 Bresnahan, 11 Chalmers, 12 Chance, 15 Hamilton SP, 16 Henry SP, 19 Jennings, 20 Johnson SP, 21 Keating SP, 23 Leach, 24 Leibold SP, 25 Lelivelt SP, 27 L. Magee SP, 28 S. Magee SP, 31 McBride SP, 33 McLean, 34 Morgan SP, 35 Murphy,  41 Reulbach, 42 Saier, 45 Schulte SP, 51 Wingo

Jimi

Posted By: Jimi
I now have an extra T222 Fatima of Wally Schang in an SGC 30 holder.  It's available for $135 by check or Paypal.  I will also trade it for my needs above.  Thanks!

Jimi

Posted By: RayB
Email Scan of Front and Back of Shang please.
RayB

Posted By: Jimi
Price is lowered to $125.  Great looking SGC 30.  

Jimi

Posted By: Jimi
Price has been lowered to $115.  

Jimi
